details.name: Result Notifier
details.body:
• Project Overview: In the third year of my bachelor's degree, I started to learn python language from codecademy site by own. After completing a course, I was planning to apply my knowledge that is helpful in the real world. At that time, we have to go to the GTU website frequently to check semester result declared or not. So, I came up with the idea to create result notifier that sends a notification to students when their result declared on site. This application keep track of previous declared results and send notification to registered students when new result declare.

    • Technology & Services:
    Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL, AWS, Way2SMS, Gmail
  • Used python web scraping library to get content of the websites.
  • Hosted python script on amazon AWS and it continuously sends request to our result site 24x7.
  • Created web form for other students to register their details.
  • When the new result was declared, registered students get SMS and email notification.
  • Used way2sms and Gmail services to send notification.

details.name: HealthMate
details.body:
• Project Overview: This was the final year project of my bachelor's degree. User can book a doctor's appointment using an application as well as a website. Also, they can check the doctor has arrived at a clinic/hospital or not. Furthermore, they can also see how many patients are waiting in a queue and they will get estimated time through SMS and email notification. The motto behind this project is sometimes the patient has to wait in a critical situation at hospital/clinic. So, If the patient can check the approximate consult wait time then he/she can plan to leave home accordingly and get rest at home.

    • Technology & Services:
    Java, Hibernate, Python, HTML, CSS, Ajax, Microsoft SQL server, Way2SMS, Gmail
  • Four modules in this project: Patient, Admin, Doctor and Receptionist.
  • Admin can manage all doctor, receptionist and patient profiles. Also, they can check appointment details.
  • Used java hibernate framework to create web API. So, I did not have to write same business logic for android and web application.
  • Implemented python script to send notification to patients regarding their consultation time.
  • Used way2sms and Gmail services to send notification.

details.name: Data Analysis Projects
details.body:
• Project Overview: I have developed Greedy, Min-Max, Min-Max with alpha-beta pruning and reinforcement learning algorithm for Pallanguzhi game. It is a two player game and sister game of Mancala. Each agent played against another agent to test how well the different heuristics (strategies) helped the agent win and the observations were recorded.

    • Technology & Services:
    Python, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning
  • Developed algorithm from the scratch.
  • Greedy algorithm choose the pit with the most pieces to increase the chance of winning the game.
  • Min-Max algorithm choose optimum choice(min or max) at every level.
  • However, Min-Max algorithms time and space complexity is high so to overcome this problem implemented Min-Max with alpha-beta prunning algorithm.
  • Reinforcement learning algorithm learns which actions to perform by checking how it is rewarded for previous action.

details.name: Chat-Bot Project
details.body:
• Project Overview: In the last semester of my bachelorâ€™s, I got selected in SculptSoft as a full-time Data Analyst Intern. I worked on two live projects. The first project had over the one-year purchased dataset and my task was to highlight risk in purchasing pattern. So, I had used different python libraries to deal with noisy data. The idea behind this project is to find the same purchasing pattern or fraud/risk in large enterprise. It's very hard to catch risk manually. Data visualization is easy to explain risk in purchasing data to a non-technical person.

    • Technology & Services:
    Python, D3.js, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Tableau
  • First, I Designed and developed algorithm to clean the data.
  • Used Pandas, Matplotlib and NumPy libraries for data cleaning, manipulation and analysis tasks.
  • Utilized the data from large database to get helpful data.
  • Filtered fraud data by comparing employee and vendor details, analysing fake entries, same phone/address/email details etc in purchased data.
  • Created different charts like a bar graph, pie chart, heat map, bubble chart and histograms in Tableau.
  • Used D3.js library to create dynamic, interactive data visualizations in web browsers.
  • Mentored junior developers and conducted reviews of charts to ensure requirement satisfy.

details.name: PHP Project
details.body:
• Project Overview: During the second last week of my internship, SculptSoft offered me a full-time Software Developer position. The chatbot was my first project as a Developer. The chatbot is a virtual assistant for students who have a query in loan repayments. Also, it provides the best repayment plan based on student income and expense.

    • Technology & Services:
    Node.js, Microsoft bot framework, Dialogflow, MongoDB
  • Integrated Microsoft bot framework to build intelligent, enterprise-grade bots.
  • Used dialogflow to process a student's text and maintaining a context.
  • Created backend APIs in Node.js that work as a middleware between Microsoft bot framework, database and dialogflow.
  • Implemented different context in Dialogflow to manage conversations.
  • Desined and developed flow from user text to generate response.

details.name: Game Bot
details.body:
• Project Overview: After completion of the chatbot project, I was recruited to work on an ongoing large- scale project. It was based on the health domain to maintain patient's health data, appointment history, lab records etc. The project had 5 modules: Patient, Admin, Doctor, Clinical, and Receptionist. My task is to analyze the current system flow and solve the bugs. Also, I had to implement the new requirements to improve the user experience. This project had a weekly sprint so there was a weekly deadline. Also, the project had 4 environments: Developer, QA, Staging and Production. After careful review of first three environments deployment, new code was deployed to production so it will never affect end-user experience even with a small bug. Specific project details cannot be posted due to confidentiality reasons.

    • Technology & Services:
    CakePHP, Redis, RabbitMQ, PostgreSQL, Google Analytics, GitLab, Docker, Amazon AWS, Amazon S3, Amazon RDS, Amazon EC2, Amazon ECS
  • Got Experience in database development and design (SQL) in live project.
  • Deployed project on Amazon web service. Also, integrated many services of AWS in the project.
  • Used gitlab for code management.
  • Created backend APIs in PHP using cakephp framework.
  • Used atlassian JIRA for Scrum/Agile methodology.
  • Got experience of PHP unit-test frameworks.
